shared.model

Class PlayerReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.PlayerReference

  • public class PlayerReference
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an immutable reference to a player in a game. This class's purpose is to make JSON serialization easier.
    Author:
    Justin
